<title>System</title>

<h3>Overview</h3>

The System sub-methods represent the builtin toplevel commands in Jsi.

These may be invoked either at the toplevel, or via System, eg:

    <nowiki><pre class=verbatim>
format(<i>'%d %d'</i>, 9, 10);
System.format(<i>'%d %d'</i>, 9, 10);
</pre></nowiki>

These commands include both standard javascript commands such as:

  *  setInterval setTimeout, and clearInterval
  *  parseInt and parseFloat
  *  isFinite and isNaN
  
As well as non-standard commands such as:

  *  [./js-format.wiki|format]
  *  [./js-exec.wiki|exec]
  *  [./js-source.wiki|source]
  *  strftime and strptime, ...

For more details see [./reference.wiki#System|Reference].
